scripts.init-level-one: rm -rf prisma/migrations && cp ./init-rbac/prisma-schema/schema-rbac-level-1.prisma ./prisma/schema.prisma && cp ./init-rbac/auth-utils/auth-level-1.ts ./lib/auth.ts && npx prisma migrate reset --force --skip-seed && npx prisma migrate dev --name init-level-one && npm run seed -- level-one && npm run policy-level-one && echo 'Level one setup complete. Run npm run dev separately.'
scripts.init-level-two: rm -rf prisma/migrations && cp ./init-rbac/prisma-schema/schema-rbac-level-2.prisma ./prisma/schema.prisma && cp ./init-rbac/auth-utils/auth-level-2.ts ./lib/auth.ts && npx prisma migrate reset --force --skip-seed && npx prisma migrate dev --name init-level-two && npm run seed -- level-two && npm run policy-level-two && echo 'Level two setup complete. Run npm run dev separately.'
